    • Method Detail

      • crossEntropyError

        public double crossEntropyError(double[] y,
                                double[] y_)
        Calculate the cross entropy error of the neural network.
        Parameters:
        y - The output of the neural network.
        y_ - The actual expected output.
        Returns:
        The cross entropy error.

      • predict

        public double[] predict(double[] input)
        Give a prediction based on some input.
        Parameters:
        input - The input to the neural network which is equal in size to the number of input neurons.
        Returns:
        The output of the neural network.

      • argMax

        public static int argMax(double[] output)
        Get the position of the most probable in an output array.
        Parameters:
        output - The output of the neural network (using Softmax)
        Returns:
        The position of the most probable class.

      • train

        public double train(double[][] input,
                    double[][] output,
                    double learningRate)
        Train the neural network to predict an output given some input.
        Parameters:
        input - The input to the neural network.
        output - The target output for the given input.
        learningRate - The rate at which the neural network learns. This is normally 0.01.
        Returns:
        The error of the network as an mean cross entropy.

      • save

        public void save(java.lang.String filename)
        Saves the neural network to a file (CSV).
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename in which to save the weights to.

      • load

        public void load(java.lang.String filename)
        Loads a neural network from a file.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the file to retrieve the weights from.
